typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	pNomeArquivo as string
}
source(output(
		CLIENTE_ID as string,
		NOTA_FISCAL as string,
		DTEMISSAONF as date 'yyyyMMdd',
		VALOR_ORIG_NFST as string,
		SERIE as string,
		CONTA_CLIENTE as string,
		CNPJ_CPF as string,
		NOMECLIENTE as string,
		TERMINAL as string,
		VALOR_CONTEST_AJUSTE as string,
		VALOR_ATRIBUIDO as string,
		DATA_ATRIBUICAO as date 'yyyyMMdd',
		HORA_ATRIBUICAO as string,
		DATA_AJUSTE as date 'yyyyMMdd',
		HORA_AJUSTE as string,
		OPERADORA as string,
		{CODIGO OPERADORA} as string,
		CODMOTIVOAJUSTES as string,
		DESCMOTIVOAJUSTE as string,
		DATAABERTURAIMPU as date 'yyyyMMdd',
		DATAFECHIMPUG as date 'yyyyMMdd',
		DSPUT_ID as string,
		TP_NOTA_FISCAL as string,
		CLASSE_RECEBER as string,
		CONTACONTABIL as string,
		DESCRCONTACONTABIL as string,
		NUMERO_FATURA as string,
		VALOR_DOCTO_ORIGINAL as string,
		MES_ANO_REFERENTE as string,
		DATAVENCFATUR as date 'yyyyMMdd',
		VALOR_PAGAMENTO as string,
		DATA_ATRIBUICAO_PGTO as date 'yyyyMMdd',
		FATU_ATRIBUIDA as string,
		DTEMISSAOFATURA as date 'yyyyMMdd',
		MESANOFATURA as string,
		VALOR_FATURA as string,
		SALDO_DEVEDOR as string,
		UF as string,
		OPERADORA_REAL as string,
		SALDO_FATURA_INI as string,
		SALDO_FATURA_FIM as string,
		SEQ_RECEBIVEL as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	moveFiles: ['atlys/validados_a_processar','atlys/processados']) ~> srcArqAtlysAdj
source(output(
		ID_LOTE_ARQUIVO as decimal(28,0)
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: ("SELECT ID_LOTE_ARQUIVO FROM CONVENIO.CVTB_LOTE_ARQUIVO WHERE NM_ARQUIVO = '{$pNomeArquivo}'"),
	format: 'query') ~> BuscaLoteArqAtual
BuscaLoteArqAtual derive(SyntheticKey = 1) ~> FakeKey2
srcArqAtlysAdj derive(SyntheticKey = 1,
		NEW_VLR_ORIG_NFST = replace(VALOR_ORIG_NFST, ",", "."),
		NEW_VALOR_CONTEST_AJUSTE = replace(VALOR_CONTEST_AJUSTE, ",", "."),
		NEW_VALOR_ATRIBUIDO = replace(VALOR_ATRIBUIDO, ",", "."),
		NEW_VALOR_DOCTO_ORIGINAL = replace(VALOR_DOCTO_ORIGINAL, ",", "."),
		NEW_VALOR_PAGAMENTO = replace(VALOR_PAGAMENTO, ",", "."),
		NEW_VALOR_FATURA = replace(VALOR_FATURA, ",", "."),
		NEW_SALDO_DEVEDOR = replace(SALDO_DEVEDOR, ",", "."),
		NEW_SALDO_FATURA_INI = replace(SALDO_FATURA_INI, ",", "."),
		NEW_SALDO_FATURA_FIM = replace(SALDO_FATURA_FIM, ",", ".")) ~> FakeKey1
FakeKey1, FakeKey2 join(FakeKey1@SyntheticKey == FakeKey2@SyntheticKey,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join
Join sink(allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		ID_ATLYS_ADJ as decimal(28,0),
		ID_LOTE_ARQUIVO as decimal(28,0),
		ID_CLIENTE as string,
		NOTA_FISCAL as string,
		DT_EMISSAO_NF as timestamp,
		VLR_ORIG_NFST as decimal(10,2),
		SERIE as string,
		CONTA_CLIENTE as string,
		CNPJ_CPF as string,
		NOM_CLIENTE as string,
		NUM_TERMINAL as string,
		VLR_CONTEST_AJUSTE as decimal(10,2),
		VLR_ATRIBUIDO as decimal(10,2),
		DT_ATRIBUICAO as timestamp,
		HR_ATRIBUICAO as string,
		DT_AJUSTE as timestamp,
		HR_AJUSTE as string,
		OPERADORA as string,
		CODIGO_OPERADORA as string,
		COD_MOTIVO_AJUSTES as string,
		DESC_MOTIVO_AJUSTE as string,
		DATA_ABERTURA_IMPU as timestamp,
		DATA_FECH_IMPUG as timestamp,
		DSPUT_ID as string,
		TP_NOTA_FISCAL as string,
		CLASSE_RECEBER as string,
		CONTA_CONTABIL as string,
		DESCR_CONTA_CONTABIL as string,
		NUMERO_FATURA as string,
		VALOR_DOCTO_ORIGINAL as decimal(15,2),
		MES_ANO_REFERENTE as string,
		DATA_VENC_FATUR as timestamp,
		VALOR_PAGAMENTO as decimal(15,2),
		DATA_ATRIBUICAO_PGTO as timestamp,
		FATU_ATRIBUIDA as string,
		DT_EMISSAO_FATURA as timestamp,
		MES_ANO_FATURA as string,
		VALOR_FATURA as decimal(15,2),
		SALDO_DEVEDOR as decimal(15,2),
		UF as string,
		OPERADORA_REAL as string,
		SALDO_FATURA_INI as decimal(15,2),
		SALDO_FATURA_FIM as decimal(15,2),
		SEQ_RECEBIVEL as string
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		ID_LOTE_ARQUIVO,
		ID_CLIENTE = CLIENTE_ID,
		NOTA_FISCAL,
		DT_EMISSAO_NF = DTEMISSAONF,
		VLR_ORIG_NFST = NEW_VLR_ORIG_NFST,
		SERIE,
		CONTA_CLIENTE,
		CNPJ_CPF,
		NOM_CLIENTE = NOMECLIENTE,
		NUM_TERMINAL = TERMINAL,
		VLR_CONTEST_AJUSTE = NEW_VALOR_CONTEST_AJUSTE,
		VLR_ATRIBUIDO = NEW_VALOR_ATRIBUIDO,
		DT_ATRIBUICAO = DATA_ATRIBUICAO,
		HR_ATRIBUICAO = HORA_ATRIBUICAO,
		DT_AJUSTE = DATA_AJUSTE,
		HR_AJUSTE = HORA_AJUSTE,
		OPERADORA,
		CODIGO_OPERADORA = {CODIGO OPERADORA},
		COD_MOTIVO_AJUSTES = CODMOTIVOAJUSTES,
		DESC_MOTIVO_AJUSTE = DESCMOTIVOAJUSTE,
		DATA_ABERTURA_IMPU = DATAABERTURAIMPU,
		DATA_FECH_IMPUG = DATAFECHIMPUG,
		DSPUT_ID,
		TP_NOTA_FISCAL,
		CLASSE_RECEBER,
		CONTA_CONTABIL = CONTACONTABIL,
		DESCR_CONTA_CONTABIL = DESCRCONTACONTABIL,
		NUMERO_FATURA,
		VALOR_DOCTO_ORIGINAL = NEW_VALOR_DOCTO_ORIGINAL,
		MES_ANO_REFERENTE,
		DATA_VENC_FATUR = DATAVENCFATUR,
		VALOR_PAGAMENTO = NEW_VALOR_PAGAMENTO,
		DATA_ATRIBUICAO_PGTO,
		FATU_ATRIBUIDA,
		DT_EMISSAO_FATURA = DTEMISSAOFATURA,
		MES_ANO_FATURA = MESANOFATURA,
		VALOR_FATURA = NEW_VALOR_FATURA,
		SALDO_DEVEDOR = NEW_SALDO_DEVEDOR,
		UF,
		OPERADORA_REAL,
		SALDO_FATURA_INI = NEW_SALDO_FATURA_INI,
		SALDO_FATURA_FIM = NEW_SALDO_FATURA_FIM,
		SEQ_RECEBIVEL
	)) ~> GravaTabContestacoesAtlysAdj
